articles.description: The 49-year-old multihyphenate was supported by his family as he threw the ceremonial first pitch at the New York Yankees game on Monday night.
articles.content:
He wears many hats including musician, rapper, record producer, entrepreneur, and fashion icon.
But Pharrell Williams' most fulfilling role certainly seems to be being a husband and father.
The 49-… [+3302 chars]

articles.title: ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ Renewed for Season 12 at HBO - Variety
